title: Hunt.io
description:
Hunt.io connector imports Observables linked to C2 infrastructures detected by HuntIO sensors.

You need to provides a HuntIO API key.

The connector will convert scanned C2 Infrastructure data into various related STIX 2.1 Objects and relationships to ingest into OpenCTI:
- IPv4, domains, network-traffic Observables
- Infrastructure “consist-of” ipv4 and domains Observables
- The infrastructure “controls” a Malware
- url Indicator “indicates” a Malware
- Observed Data wrapping up domain, ip and network traffic

Warning: The volume of data to ingest at first launch may take a long time.
short_description: Hunt.io connector imports Observables linked to C2 infrastructures detected by HuntIO sensors.
